Hi all, quick question: can someone enlighten me to the benefits of using @=
BeforeClass vs 
using a static{} constructor for my test classes?  Actually=
, I suspect there are reasons to be 
using both, but I haven't really found=
 any convincing cases yet for code to go into one over 
the other.

Thought=
s?
